item.title: Life of Pi
item.description: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

shorttext.p: Action · PG ·127 min ·

A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

item.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
item.description: 10 years after a disease that spread around the globe, the apes have to go face-to-face with a band of human survivors and a traitor who is obsessed with destroying both humans and apes.

shorttext.span: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
shorttext.p: Action · PG-13 · 130 min ·
10 years after a disease that spread around the globe, the apes have to go face-to-face with a band of human survivors and a traitor who is obsessed with destroying both humans and apes.

item.title: Lone Survivor
item.description: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or eliminate notorious terrorist Ahmad Shah. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

shorttext.p: Action · R · 121 min ·

Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or eliminate notorious terrorist Ahmad Shah. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

item.title: All Is Lost

item.title: Lucy
item.description: A seemingly ordinary woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, quickly turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved way beyond human logic.

item.title: Godzilla
item.description: Fifteen years after an incident at a Japanese nuclear power plant, the world's most famous monster is pitted against malevolent creatures who threaten our very existence.

item.description: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, who trained Bruce Lee and coined the phrase "In martial-arts there is no right or wrong, only the last man standing".

The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, who trained Bruce Lee and coined the phrase "In martial-arts there is no right or wrong, only the last man standing".

item.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
item.description: The adventures of Gustave H., a legendary concierge at a very famous European hotel between the wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

item.title: The Lego Movie

item.title: Dom Hemingway
item.description: After spending twelve years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he is owed.

After spending twelve years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he is owed.

item.title: Neighbors
item.description: An immature couple with a newborn infant go to war with a fraternity next door that turns their once-peaceful neighborhood into party central in this outrageous comedy of one-upsmanship.

shorttext.p: Comedy · R · 97 min ·
An immature couple with a newborn infant go to war with a fraternity next door that turns their once-peaceful neighborhood into party central in this outrageous comedy of one-upsmanship.

item.title: Rio 2
item.description: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids hurtled to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

shorttext.p: Comedy · PG · 101 min ·

item.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

item.title: Her
item.description: In a not so distant future, Theodore purchases a newly designed operating system. To the lonely writer’s surprise, a romantic relationship develops between him and his operating system.

item.title: The Fault in Our Stars
item.description: Hazel and Gus share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank.

shorttext.p: Drama · PG-13 · 127 min ·

Hazel and Gus share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank.

item.title: La grande bellezza
item.description: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday Jep looks past nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

item.description: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will he go to protect his family?

item.title: Divergent

item.title: Snowpiercer
item.description: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet except for a lucky few who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system emerges.

item.description: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow runners for a shot at escape.
